website_summaries.verdict: This is an affordable option if you're interested in trying acne body sprays to see if they will help you.
pros: This bottle has a special pump that works from any angle
It won't stain clothes and has moisturizing ingredients to help keep your skin from drying out
cons: The sprayer is prone to clogging, making it difficult to get product out

customer_reviews.title: Great for inside masks!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this stuff Inside my mask to reduce bacteria and moistness & it works wonders. I highly recommend anyone use this in their mask if you are prone to breakouts or have recently got “maskne.” The smell isn’t overpowering and it has helped my breakouts / not made any more breakouts ever since I started spraying my mask.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far it works as well as the ' acne-free' spray, and the only reason I switched from that is bc it's aerosol. And I'm trying to move away from aerosol sprays so I ordered this one and it seems to works great and it's actually less sticky on my skin and fries faster than the Acne-free spray.
customer_reviews.author: VeronicaB.

customer_reviews.title: Mascne miracle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to spray on the inside of my mask while I’m at work to combat mascne (acne on my face where my mask is all the time). I was concerned that there would be a suffocating chemical smell but there isn’t so I’m impressed. It also feels good on my skin and not overly drying it out.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Yockey

customer_reviews.title: I need more
customer_reviews.text: I use this because having to wear a mask all day. I started breaking out. You can feel it working it has a slit burn feeling when it hits your pimples. I had quite a few white heads on my side and now they are gone just left over redness
customer_reviews.author: kellsie

customer_reviews.title: Don't get your hopes up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with high expectations since I've used other products by Nature's Cure (5% benzoyl peroxide and their female 30 day acne pills) and I had a lot of successful outcomes with their products. This one doesn't work. I do appreciate that the nozzle is designed to be sprayed upside down. I think a lot of these other companies that also produce a similar product forget about those details.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: This is thee worst product I've ever tried
customer_reviews.text: This is thee worst product I've ever tried. I saw so many good reviews so I figured I'd try it. I was frustrated and has tried everything. And now? Four days and my body has just blown out in a full outbreak. It's summer and I can't even wear a swimsuit. I'm humiliated to say the least. Don't wast your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Amaya

customer_reviews.title: Prevent mask break outs!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect if you have to wear a mask all day! I spray my mask before wearing it to prevent breakouts!! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: SECOND BOTTLE
customer_reviews.text: at first i only use on my back because i wanted to try it first to see if it works then move on to my face. My back completely cleared out after 3 days, then my chest, and then finally use it on my face and the results are all amazing. i used it for over a year now. ordering my second bottle
customer_reviews.author: Thu Pham

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: THANK YOU FOR THIS PRODUCT!!!! I’m 31-years-old and my back acne is horrific. I had it as a teenager and it has returned with a vengeance. My doctor said Accutane may have to be my final option (which destroys your insides to clear the outside). I tried this spray as a last resort... I have only used it for two days! TWO!!! And I can already see an improvement! Fingers crossed that it continues to help!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Clare P.

customer_reviews.title: Good for maskne
customer_reviews.text: I am a dental assistant and have to wear a kn95 every day all day now and have started breaking out. I still get little break outs using this product but I think they would be worse without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a while. I do like it, it is not the best for that stubborn cyst acne but it doesn't stain clothes at all! I love the smell and the spray does work upside down!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Used it on my son everyday as directed and didnt notice it work at all.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shayka

customer_reviews.title: Okay so far. But no change.
customer_reviews.text: Been using for about a week morning and night. Not seeing any difference. I have had bacne for 10 years now. Fluctuating in severity. Hoping this will help. Want clear sink for wedding. We will see. Will update in a month. This products Does not smell bad or make you cough like another product I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa S-A

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works. I have always struggled with acne on my back (made worse by commuting with a backpack most days). Even though I have only used this spray sporadically, I notice a big difference each time. For comparison, I have used Neutrogena Acne Wash for years, which helps a bit, but this spray is much more dramatic. My back feels nice and smooth! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Emily H

customer_reviews.title: Maskne
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got the dreaded acne from wearing a mask at school. This was the perfect solution! She sprays it on the inside of her mask, lets it dry and then wears it with no breakouts! Be sure to let it dry or it will cause some irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Possert

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter suffers from chest and back acne. The upside down spray is nice. She saw an improvement in just a week or so. It is not completely gone but much better
customer_reviews.author: KDL

customer_reviews.title: Good for prevention
customer_reviews.text: Using it for my face and on my masks. Spray is great and I believe it’s helping prevent breakouts with the daily mask usage. It does make your face dry so make you sure moisture!!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: great product, finally a regimen our 14 yr old will stick with
customer_reviews.text: small bottle but a great product, great idea to have a spray. finally a regimen our teen son will stick with. says for body only, not to use on face. warns not to spray on lips or get in eyes. wish it could be sprayed on the face
customer_reviews.author: CaringConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing and smells good
customer_reviews.text: Great spray, keeps my skin clear and vibrant. It smells good too, leaves your skin feeling fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: It worked, But takes time
customer_reviews.text: Used for 3 weeks and the backacne fade a lot. It is said that u should used for couple months and i will wait and see. But i also order SAL3 salicylic acid sulfur soap bar today, will use with it and see if it will have better result. It is not easy to spray by yourself though, and have to wear the clothes without cloth on the back when u spray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's effective even more so with sunlight
customer_reviews.text: I'm a (female) runner and as soon as I sweat, I break out. I've tried both benzoyl, sacilyic wash and treatment, clindamyacin and sulfur. This is the only thing that works. I've been to the dermatologist so many times for this. Just try it you won't be disappointed. It takes a couple of weeks of consistent use and don't pick!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny L Grondin

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: REALLY WORKS! I was training for a half marathon this summer - running, cross training, hiking and sweating daily with friction rubs from workout gear and awful breakouts on my back. This product smells good, doesn't upset my sensitive skin and works so well. I'm now breakout free and so happy my skin is back to normal. Would HIGHLY recommend this spray!
customer_reviews.author: Louise Royston

customer_reviews.title: I was using Neutrogena body spray but decided to purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: I was using Neutrogena body spray but decided to purchase this to see how it worked. No complaints but no difference as well. It helps maintain my skin but no noticeable differences in helping my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Morales

customer_reviews.title: Works- bottle not full though
customer_reviews.text: Works well but sucks that it gets used so fast. Wish they made bigger bottle options. These bottles also aren’t filled completely, which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha B. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My teenagers have had great results with Nature's Cure Acne Treatment products. This is the first time I have ordered the spray. My daughter loves it. She has acne on her back, chest and upper arms. The biggest problem she faced was that she had to have help to apply any treatment to her back. The spray solves that and she said it is faster and easier to apply to her chest and arms as well. Great product and now more convenient to use. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: It seemed like since it was just applying such a thin film ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the acne spray to use on my back to help prevent acne- it was to hard for me to apply to my back without help. It seemed like since it was just applying such a thin film of product it really didn't do much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients bad spray bottle.
customer_reviews.text: The product works and has a high concentration of salycilic acid but it DOES NOT spray in any direction. I turned the bottle upside down to use it on my back and it wouldnt work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Ineffective. I have been using this for over a month now and have had absolutely no improvement with the acne on my back.
customer_reviews.author: LaBoss

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Stings a bit but does seem to make a difference i spray on a cotton pad to apply
customer_reviews.author: Emily M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great! I workout twice a day and have developed back acne from sweating so much. So I decided to give this a try. I use it three times a day in the morning after my workouts, before my workout, and before bed. It has cleared my acne up within 3 weeks of using it. I ordered another bottle because this is the only product that I have found that actually works. It's better than Proactiv (it didn't work for me).
customer_reviews.author: Va'Lyndi Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Better solution: 2% sa pads that are half the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is ok. It’s a very small bottle that stops working once there is 1/3 left. 90% of the ingredients are pseudo science. Better solution: 2% sa pads that are half the price and work better.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Used this only a few times, made my back itchy and kinda sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the product you receive.
customer_reviews.text: I got a bottle without any packaging or seal. Just the bottle. Inside was a partially filled dark yellow liquid that smelled like hairspray which should be a clear liquid. Seems like someone refilled it with something else and the seller resold it. The real product, on the other hand, works great.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this! Definitely helps fight the acne due to mask wearing all day everyday. I do blot my face with it via a cotton ball and I spray my mask with it everyday. Starting swing a difference in just a couple days!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: didn't expect it to, but happy to find out that it works. it seems to have reduced the acne on my back.
customer_reviews.author: Y.C.

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this one. Wont do anything to your skin but causing you more breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To inexpensive not to try. It works.
customer_reviews.text: It works well on backne and bikini line issues. The bottle really sprays from all directions. This is my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Campbell

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: I used this for what seemed like months and had no changes to my body acne issues. If anything it only dried my back out and made the acne worse. I don't really recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Smadams

customer_reviews.title: Only 2/3 of the product came?
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but the bottle came in a half wrapped plastic and came only 2/3 full. I picked it up and it felt light so i looked inside and it wasn't full all the way. Feels like this was part of a 3 pack or someone used it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Han

customer_reviews.title: Thanks but No Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: It seems to get the job done for the most part; didn't notice any huge improvements while using it but didn't get any additional breakouts or anything. Either way, the bottle was way too small (I thought) and the product once applied, way too sticky. I'll pass.
customer_reviews.author: N. A. Kovic

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It is easy to use and I can apply it myself, which is mainly what I was looking for. I’ve seen a lot of improvement in my skin since starting to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Super hard to apply to self. Doesn't work at all, at least for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing but smell bad
customer_reviews.text: Does nothing , Acne Free brand is much better. Assume it has stronger salicylic acid.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It's hard to spray my back on my own, but the bottle sprays from any direction which helps. But I actually see improvement when I use this!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: My go-to spray for acne (bacne)
customer_reviews.text: Best spray for acne in hard to reach places. Does not stain clothes. I’ve used it for years.
customer_reviews.author: William Decker

customer_reviews.title: I really like this. It's easy to use right out of ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. It's easy to use right out of the shower and has helped. I've been using this for about a month and it's stopped new breakouts. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer gets clogged easily and doesn't spray well
customer_reviews.text: Sprayer gets clogged easily and doesn't spray well. Isn't a smooth pump sprayer if that makes sense. I was hoping to find something similar to the Neutrogena body spray that seems to have been discontinued. This is okay, but not an exact match.
customer_reviews.author: mocomo

customer_reviews.title: Body acne cure!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING! I saw results almost immediately. I used it 2-3 times a day, and now I am down to using it every other day as a preventative. I would recommend this product to anyone. It worked wonders for me.
customer_reviews.author: K.G.

customer_reviews.title: good spray
customer_reviews.text: I find it perfect for my back and shoulders to protect it from acne I love it till now it works with me
customer_reviews.author: m.I.

customer_reviews.title: Received more than half empty :(
customer_reviews.text: I just received my bottle today and was excited to try it, but when i opened it I saw it was less than half full. A little bummed out about that.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole musgrave

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was too slow and also I do not even like this product. A bunch of the ingredients are alternative medicine/ herbal BS. I only buy it because there is no better alternative
customer_reviews.author: Olga Creighton

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Got this to spray in my mask to help with mascne (acne caused by wearing masks) Didn't really seem to make much difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, sprays upside down, no bad odor, and not sticky. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This products is pretty good! I started using it because it's cheaper ...
customer_reviews.text: This products is pretty good! I started using it because it's cheaper and easier to find than the Neutrogena 180 body spray. I will probably end up buying this again when it runs out, but it gets 4 stars because I still prefer the Neutrogena one.
customer_reviews.author: Christina A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for body acne in hard to reach places. Mild enough not to irritate my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: lizlemon333

customer_reviews.title: Works well on my back. Took a few weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my back. Took a few weeks to see results but now I have no problems when I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Smells good and worked just as well as my (expensive) Murad body spray I used to buy before!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: effective
customer_reviews.text: This has been very helpful. I noticed a big difference after a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use spray bottle
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use spray bottle. I've been using it for a few weeks and don't see any improvement. My back is still breaking out.
customer_reviews.author: JCSF

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a month now and see no difference with my acne. Also doesn’t spray well
customer_reviews.author: Joder

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. No visible change after weeks of using it, but maybe it's just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have never use other products so I can’t compare.. But I am very happy with this It works well with my back acne .
customer_reviews.author: Rie T.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this is helping or the prescribed medication but we are happy with it for my sons back acne
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Please Bring Back in Stock!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It's so good at keeping zits at bay! I use it on my body and even on my face and everything has cleared right up! I didn't have sever acne but just regular zits here and there and now they are all gone!! Please bring this product back!
customer_reviews.author: Chihuahua Mama

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for almost two months and it has done nothing to clear my body acne. I was very disappointed after seeing that it had gotten so many good reviews, but maybe it just isn't right for my skin type. I had pretty severe acne all over my back, chest, and a little on my shoulders but this spray hasn't made any difference. Also, it leaves a slight stickiness after applying and is difficult to spray upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the smell, did not work on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Rineman

customer_reviews.title: It's so easy to use and I love it
customer_reviews.text: It's so good, I like it so much, it's so good, it's just a bottle of it
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: I have bad back acne and after a week of using this
customer_reviews.text: I have bad back acne and after a week of using this, I saw a drastic difference. Will be buying again because I am almost out.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel052302

customer_reviews.title: Worked pretty well on my son's arm
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty well on my son's arm, back, and chest acne - have to use daily to keep skin clear.
customer_reviews.author: SAE

customer_reviews.title: Like this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten good results with this product even when prescriptions wouldn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: This product really does work!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works! I was surprised but it only took a little over a week to see results with back acne.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Tingle

customer_reviews.title: Great natural cure
customer_reviews.text: Works great! An aerosol would be easier to use but still worked well
customer_reviews.author: Ross A. Sather

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: spray dries rashes and does not dry the skin. has a bit of bluff smell while spraying. good volume. got lost on the way from the spray cap
customer_reviews.author: Nataly

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: With Acne on my back it is hard to reach and with this spray it makes that much easier to reach. Feels a little sticky but goes away after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Effective
customer_reviews.text: This product was perfect for spraying on hard to reach areas on my back and shoulders. It does well at fighting acne breakouts that are already existing on your body but does not do a good job at preventing acne from coming back.
customer_reviews.author: angelbearbp

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Dries out body acne in a matter of days! I loved this product! It runs out in about a month, so it lasts quite a while! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Runs out quickly and I didn’t see a huge difference
customer_reviews.text: Runs out quickly and I didn’t see a huge difference
customer_reviews.author: Lea Dochterman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son is using this with the pill/crème and it seems to be helping his acne
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R.

customer_reviews.title: Works just like it says!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! it works quickly. I would definitely purchase this again...and I have.
customer_reviews.author: Reader in MD

customer_reviews.title: VERY easy to use
customer_reviews.text: VERY easy to use, since it sprays from all angles. I've only been using it for about a week, so no real results yet, but I have high hopes!
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but didn't really work for my back ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but didn't really work for my back and shoulder acne. I think I need to just go the doctor and get prescription strength stuff. The 10% stuff worked on my back but went into and bleached clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Don

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great on backacne but bottle doesnt last, so it can get expensive to be re-ordering ever 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Ag

customer_reviews.title: no luck for me, maybe for others tho
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for my chest acne.. maybe it would work for someone else?
customer_reviews.author: tatalin0608

customer_reviews.title: Half empty
customer_reviews.text: Got this half empty no plastic seal on it at all!
customer_reviews.author: Cristal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It has helped with my acne a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Tuong Vy

customer_reviews.title: This product really works. I have been using it ...
customer_reviews.text: This product really works. I have been using it for 4 weeks now and I can really see a difference. Time for me to order another bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Bonita B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Spray!
customer_reviews.text: I've been dealing with embarrassing body acne on and off since I was 15. I've tried countless body washes, creams, and lotions, and nothing has worked as well as this. It's easy to use, it doesn't leave any residue, and my skin is clearer than it's been in a long time. It's even started to heal the current breakouts I have, and with hope my skin should be completely clear in a few weeks. I just wish I had found this sooner. I will be re-purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: kmp515

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to get rid of a few pimples on my chest. I saw results in two days. I highly recommend if you want to get rid of body acne fast!
customer_reviews.author: Simplygailg

customer_reviews.title: Blah
customer_reviews.text: I used the whole thing. Maybe it helped a little. Can't really tell.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: No problems. Came quick and as expected. My daughter is excited to start using.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I cycle and this helps with some of the saddle sore problems and shaving rashes. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jabirugirl

customer_reviews.title: It is really helpful for body acne but the spray becomes to work worse and worse
customer_reviews.text: It works when all bottle has been used. I did not feel dryness like some reviewers said. After having a baby I got all my back acned. Now, they are almost gone. Also, it made my skin soft. I reordered another bottle today. However, I gave 4 because when there is quarter of the bottle left, the spray stopped worked under any angle. So, I spray on my palms and apply on the back. It is not comfortable to do.
customer_reviews.author: Inna

customer_reviews.title: Second time buying this product.
customer_reviews.text: I have some acnes on my back, and I apply it after showers. After using whole bottle, I can see them dissapearing a bit. So far no complains.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered only 3/4 full with no safety seal.
customer_reviews.author: M Float

customer_reviews.title: It works amazing and I'm acne free
customer_reviews.text: This spray has changed my life. It works amazing and I'm acne free. highly recommend for those with body acne.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: been using this for 2 days now and can honestly see a difference .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I've tried a bajillion over-the-counter and prescription ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I've tried a bajillion over-the-counter and prescription products over the years (back acne problems since my puberty, now in my 30s), and this is the only one that's made a significant difference. It's true that it won't 100% eliminate everything, but it really helped get things under control. The smell isn't overpowering, it's not too harsh on my skin, doesn't leave annoying bleached marks on my clothes or bedding. I would recommend using it regularly, even when things clear up, as it seems effective at prevention. I'd also echo other reviews that sometimes it's difficult to spray, so maybe invest in a better empty spray bottle, but otherwise I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, doesn't dry out skin
customer_reviews.text: I'd only used a Neutrogena spray before, but I couldn't find it in the store. I like this spray and I REALLY like that it doesn't dry out my skin. I bought it because I work out often, so I breakout on my back. Great purchase, will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sprayer stopped working after a few uses. Product seemed to have work..
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Had stubborn back acne that seemed to not clear up with any product. Spraying this body spray on my back a couple times a day finally seemed to do the trick! I'd recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: ana27

product_meta.title: Nature's Cure Body Acne Treatment Spray - 3.5 fl oz
product_meta.description: Size:3.5Nature's Cure Body Acne Treatment Spray - 3.5 fl oz
feature_bullets: Comes in a specially designed pump that sprays from any angle for treatment of hard-to-reach places
Fights acne caused by sweating and friction from athletic gear and clothing
Please read all label information on delivery
